comments:
Happens around code completion after one of the classes from context, which does not have sources has been opened with JadClipse 3.2.3 plugin. http://jadclipse.sf.net/

-- Error Log --
Date: Sat Dec 02 01:02:29 EST 2006
Message: An internal error occurred during: "Computing additional info".
Severity: Error
Plugin ID: org.eclipse.core.jobs
Stack Trace:
java.lang.StackOverflowError

Did you miss categorize this?  I assume it is not related to Bugzilla.  Also, is this a bug with JAD or with Mylar?
I is hard to tell  it is jadclipse bug. But it is definitely triggered by something from Mylar.
Since I can not clearly attribute this to Mylar, I suggest filing with JAD unless Mylar is clearly violating some Platform contract.
